attributes.action: Use the £11.4bn Foreign Aid Budget to help those affected by the floods .
attributes.additional_details: Its clear that the flood defences are pointless and a waste of public money Create a LA style 'Man Made River' that the rivers can connect to and over flow into toward the coast or large reservoirs, Dredge the Rivers, Possibly make them 1 Meter Deeper so they can handle more capacity. With both of these systems there will be a much greater and cost effective defence system reducing public spending in the future. Its an investment that is worth it especially when it protects homes and businesses
attributes.background:
Foreign aid budget £11.4bn
UK Flood Budget £802.6m
Use the foreign aid budget to make the Rivers deeper, Dredging etc. Maybe even build a Los Angeles Flood System across the country with rivers connected ready for when they are at risk. 
Spending the money now before it gets worse and costs more

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/115172

You could start a petition specifically calling for a 'man made river' to be created.
